verbs.description: [ARG1: Donald Trump] [V: went] [ARG2: through his normal routine] [ARGM-TMP: on Monday] [ARGM-ADV: attacking all his critics through Twitter following a news report claiming that his chief of staff John Kelly called him an " idiot] . "
